text: users love fast applications this means
applications need to access data quickly
and as applications become popular
they must scale without overloading
back-end systems caching can help with
an in-memory cache you can achieve
sub-millisecond response times manage
spikes in demand and cost-effectively
scale your back-end memcache D is a
popular open source in-memory data store
the developers use as a high-performance
cache to speed up applications by
storing everything in memory instead of
on disk memcache deep can retrieve data
in less than a millisecond memcache D is
a key value store it works by keeping a
key for every piece of data it stores
this key uniquely identifies each record
and lets memcache D quickly find it but
deploying maintaining and scaling
memcache D can be challenging Amazon
ElastiCache from memcache D is a fully
managed memcache D service that
simplifies administrative tasks so you
can focus on high value application
development it is memcache D compatible
so your existing memcache D applications
work seamlessly without changes
ElastiCache from memcache D supports
Amazon virtual private cloud helping you
keep your data isolated and secure
ElastiCache from memcache D features
Auto discovery which helps developers
save time by simplifying the way an
application connects to a cluster it is
easy to scale your ElastiCache cluster
to handle more data and operations since
memcache D distributes its data among
available nodes you can store more data
by adding new nodes and since memcache D
makes use of multiple processing cores
you can handle more operations by adding
compute capacity start small and adjust
to meet fluctuating demand Amazon
ElastiCache from memcache D gives you
the ability to quickly deploy and cost
effectively manage memcache D clusters
to power the most demanding real-time
applications
get started today
